message: I'm excited to offer you this exceptional product, and I'm confident that it will meet your expectations. I've had great feedback from previous customers who have purchased similar items. Would you like to take a chance on this high-quality product for $10000?
I'm not going to take the chance on a product that you're trying to sell me based on 'great feedback from previous customers' without knowing the actual quality of the product.
